'''"To Have Color, or Go Without"''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a [[Hidden Exploration Objective]] that takes place in [[Natlan]]. Completing it grants a Precious Chest and the {{Achievement|Starving Artist}}.

==Location==
<gallery>
HEO "To Have Color, or Go Without" Location.png|Location
HEO "To Have Color, or Go Without" Location Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Steps==
# Free the following [[Monetoo|Hued Monetoo]] in any order:
#* Under the large stone block:
#** [[Saurian Indwelling|Indwell]] an [[Iktomisaurus]] (or use a [[Masters of the Night-Wind]] character)
#** Scan the nearby [[Nightspirit Graffiti]] and place the balloon on top of the stone block
#* Under the inflatable ring:
#** Scan the nearby Nightspirit Graffiti to remove the inflatable ring
#* Near the warriors:
#** Defeat enemies{{Enemy List|Spiritspeaker Warrior: Psychokinetic;Spiritspeaker Warrior: Contemplator}}
# Fill the wall with color
#* Hold the Elemental Skill button to continuously throw paint until the Precious Chest unlocks
